metadata.description: All over the world, zombies are crawling from their graves and feasting on human flesh. Elijah, a time-lost hunter with a dark past, knows that it falls upon him to become the hero he was destined to be. But first, he must solve a mystery rooted in his own past, one that stretches back to the cane fields of 1800s Louisiana. Will Elijah be able to confront and bury the grasping terror of history before it devours him? UNLEASHED tie-in!
metadata.name: Unleashed: Zombies Cursed
